title: Which University is the best options to study MBBS in Europe for Indian students? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: Hi, I am an educational consultant at Global Medical Foundation who has helped 350+ students get admission for MBBS in abroad. I have already written a blog post on this on the website of Global Medical Foundation. When you think about Europe, countries like Spain, Italy, Germany comes to mind. But let’s check which countries in Europe do Indian students actually go to study MBBS -   As you can see, only 2 countries stand out - Russia and Ukraine. In my opinion, doing MBBS from Ukraine is best and most cost effective among all the countries in Europe. The Universities offer 6 year MD course which is equivalent to MBBS in India. There are many MCI Approved universities in Ukraine which have very good MCI Passing Percentage. MBBS in Ukraine is a great option. The Universities in Ukraine are either at State level or at National level, meaning that these are Government universities. Moreover, these universities are very old, some being more than 200 years old. Since you are getting admission in universities with such great stature, you are provided with a better opportunity in Ukraine. Here are some reviews of students doing their MBBS from Ukraine:  The best university in my opinion is Vinnitsa National Medical University in Ukraine. The university had a FMGE passing percentage of approx. 23% between 2012–18 which is one of the highest. Also, there are other very good universities like Bukovinian State Medical Univeristy, V.N.Karazin National Medical University, Ternopil National Medical University, Kharkiv National Medical University. There is no easy way to success. You need to study hard and work harder than you have to achieve success in the field of medicine. The education quality is Ukraine is of a very high standard given that you will get admission in Government medical universities which are about 100–200 years old. At the end of the day, remember, its your hard work that will get you across the line.

Becoming a doctor Is a most popular career goal and an aim many have since their childhood. Medicine is a versatile field that can be studied anywhere that’s why students have many choices. It is most important to choose best for you. The choice of the medical college must be planned in advance. If you narrow your research you will have plenty of options for study MBBS in Europe but you have to take a closer look and select the best options. Here is a list of top 3 medical colleges in Europe: 1 ETH Zurich->ETH Zurich –Swiss Federal Institute of Technology is ranked 11 th worldwide. It was established in 1855. Students are given an ideal environment to think, research which imparts top performance. It is one of the best-ranked university not only in Europe but worldwide. 2 LMU Munich ->Ludwig Maximilians University is ranked 32 th worldwide. The eligibility criteria include IELTS. This University highly supports research work by providing services like consultation, funding and legal aspects of the project . It has been considered as University of excellence. 3 Karolinska Institute -> Karolinska Institute is located in Solna and considered as one of the prestigious medical colleges around the world. This Institute concerns more about practical knowledge and innovation with theory. The total fee is 15 to 24 lakhs. The eligibility criteria include IELTS score minimum 6 and TOEFL score 90 minimum.
